title: Ratio Technology Launch Integrated Dropper Remote for SRAM 11 & 12s Apex Levers
content:
Want to add dropper post actuation to your SRAM 11s or 12s Apex groupset? Ratio Technology have a neat, ergonomically-friendly and affordable solution.

Read the full article at Ratio Technology Launch Integrated Dropper Remote for SRAM 11 & 12s Apex Levers on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
